messages.subject: hanta virus
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/25/04 3:06:31 AM, Sanguinegirl83@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/25/04 3:06:31 AM, Sanguinegirl83@... writes:

<< I looked at several sources, but couldn't find a definition-could you
please
tell me what the "hunta virus" is? Thanks! >>

It came up on google, but it also said "you want to check hanta virus?"
I guess that's the more correct spelling, though I've only seen the other.

-=-http://www.cdc.gov/ncidod/diseases/hanta/hps/-=-

There's the Center for Disease Control's blurb on it. I live right in the
area where it's been identified several times.

Sandra
